title: Joshua Tree National Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Media Quality   8 Photos  High-resolution images of the Joshua Tree National Park landscape and visitor activities.          Joshua Tree Scenery   17 Photos  View the diverse desert landscape of Joshua Tree National Park.          Yuccas, Cacti, and Succulents   10 Photos  These specially adapted plants are iconic to arid desert environments.             Wildlife   27 Photos  Often appearing lifeless, the desert is home to a wide variety species.          Kids in the Park   3 Photos            Rock Climbing   7 Photos  Joshua Tree is a premier destination for climbers from around the world.            Ryan Mountain   14 Photos
